title: 21: Hit Em With The Prenup ft. Mrs. Dow Jones
description:
Because when he leaves your ass he’s gonna leave with half...

In honor of celebrating bad ass women this March, Sofia is joined by finance expert Haley Sacks aka Mrs. Dow Jones. If you’re wondering EXACTLY how to become the independent and rich boss b*tch that you are, you’ve come to the right place. Mrs. Dow Jones breaks down the ins and outs of finance in only a way a TRUE Sloot knows how with ridiculous banter and inappropriate sex comments of course. In this episode, the two discuss the beginner steps on how to start investing, how to strategically spend your money, and even how to convince your boy toy to get you that Chanel (ps. it’s an investment). HAPPY WOMEN’S HISTORY MONTH SLOOTS!

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter SofiaFranklyn
